designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender)
client-ip=217.204.130.186; envelope-from=christophers@nr-online.com;
helo=nr-online.com;
Message-ID: <EXCHFRONT02wZlpPs5Y00003343@smtp02.theplanet.com>

FILETIME=[FF367E70:01C72ABF] 

MIME element (text/plain)
NetResult Internal Reference:  CrkAus_NRID14242 
 
Please quote the above CrkAus_NRID14242 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue. 
 
 
Dear Sirs,  
 
We write on behalf of Cricket Australia, in respect of certain
intellectual property rights including Audio Visual content. 
 
We have noticed that your Web Site, http://www.kushil.net/Cricket.aspx
is displaying and/or offering Cricket Australia audio visual content.
All copyright in such images vest with Cricket Australia.  
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from Cricket
Australia to use this content, your present use is a clear infringement
of Cricket Australia's rights and patently infringes the copyright held
in that content.  Please be aware that under relevant copyright laws,
the copyright held in a broadcast includes the right to rebroadcast the
broadcast, whether within or outside of Australia.  Any broadcast or
rebroadcast of the content - including by way of making the broadcast
available online - in any territory in the world is an infringement upon
this right unless done so with Cricket Australia's consent, which has
not been provided to you or in respect of your website. 
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of Cricket Australia's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement
not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which
are expressly reserved.   
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I Christopher Stokes, hereby state that Cricket Australia is the owner
of the exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is
authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance. On behalf of Cricket Australia, I hereby state that I have a
good faith belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is
not authorised by Cricket Australia, its agents, or the law. 
 
I, Christopher Stokes, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally
sign this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.  
 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Christopher Stokes 
 
 
NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA 
 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1731 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
